= How to run program =


== Run program ==

To run program use the following command:
{{{ 
 java -jar jbossinstaller.jar
}}}

Then go to [http://localhost:2410]

== How to change port number ==
{{{ 
 java -jar jbossinstaller.jar PORTNUMBER
}}}
for example:
 
{{{ 
java -jar jbossinstaller.jar 9999
}}}
